import React from'react';import Card from'./Card';import Button from'./Button';/**
 * Reusable form container component
 * @param {Object} props - Component props
 * @param {String} props.title - Form title
 * @param {Function} props.onSubmit - Form submission handler
 * @param {Function} props.onCancel - Cancel button handler
 * @param {Boolean} props.loading - Loading state
 * @param {String} props.submitText - Text for submit button
 * @param {String} props.cancelText - Text for cancel button
 * @param {String} props.className - Additional class names

 * @param {React.ReactNode} props.children - Form inputs
 */import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FormContainer=_ref=>{let{title,onSubmit,onCancel,loading=false,submitText='Save',cancelText='Cancel',className='',showCancel=true,children}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{title:title,className:`mb-6 ${className}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:onSubmit,children:[children,/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-end space-x-2 mt-4",children:[showCancel&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"button",variant:"outline",onClick:onCancel,disabled:loading,children:cancelText}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",disabled:loading,children:loading?'Please wait...':submitText})]})]})});};export default FormContainer;
